attributes.action: Hand the NHS over to Tesco
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I've seen enough in the last 10 years and billions of £'s of 'investment' to prove that the NHS is beyond repair.

What can be done? 

If Tesco can make £ billions of profit whilst opening brand-new well designed stores, open for 24hours a day by selling jeans for £3 a pop then I reckon they should be given a chance to turn things around.

Whilst we are at it, lets give the Schools to Marks & Spencer.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
